value.title: Ally Fashion, 145 Store Footprint Retailer, to Put Next-Gen AI Tech to the Test
value.excerpt: Going beyond rules-based personalization, Ally Fashion are putting breakout eCommerce AI leader, Particular Audience, to the test.
